title: Fans Get Angry at Messi Event in India
summary: Lionel Messi, a famous soccer player, visited India for a special tour. Thousands of fans went to a big stadium in Kolkata to see him. They paid a lot of money for tickets, hoping to watch him play or get close to him. But Messi only walked around the field for a short time, and many people could not see him well because officials and celebrities blocked the view. He left early, which made some fans very upset. They started throwing chairs and bottles and damaged things in the stadium. The leader of West Bengal said she was shocked by what happened. Messi's tour includes other cities in India, and he had a big statue made of him in Kolkata. Fans were excited but felt disappointed because they did not get what they expected.

background_read: Lionel Messi is a very popular soccer player from Argentina who has won many awards, like the Ballon d'Or. He plays for Inter Miami and the Argentina national team. In India, he went on a tour to meet fans in cities like Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai, and Delhi. Fans love him and often pay money to see him play or get close to him. Sometimes, big events can have problems if fans feel disappointed, like when they cannot see their favorite star. This article talks about what happened when Messi visited Kolkata and fans got angry because they did not get to see him properly.
